content: shrug-a-licious copyright november 2005 eileen tepper edits made february 24 2006 yarn and materials used andean treasure from http //www knitpicks com 10-11 skeins depending on size size j hook the great thing about this pattern is that any yarn or hook can be used just start with a beginning chain that fits around the forearm and work accordingly pattern as written makes woman s size small notes all stitches are in between the posts of the double_crochet of the previous round not in the actual double_crochet at the beginning of most rounds rather than chain 3 for first double_crochet i do a single_crochet and chain 2 i think it looks better leaving less of a gap for a larger size start with a longer chain and work accordingly and/or repeat round 42 of the back for a wider back and/or work more rounds of the collar pattern chain 30 join in beginning chain making sure not to twist round 1 chain 3 double_crochet in each chain around join to top chain of beginning chain 3 round 2 turn single_crochet between 1st and 2nd double_crochet chain 2 counts as first double_crochet now and throughout double_crochet in between next and all double_crochet join in top chain 30 double_crochet round 3-8 turn repeat round 2 round 9 repeat round 2 increasing 2 double_crochet in the round 32 double_crochet round 10-12 repeat round 2 round 13 repeat round 9 34 double_crochet round 14-16 repeat round 2 round 17 repeat round 9 36 double_crochet round 18-20 repeat round 2 round 21 repeat round 9 38 double_crochet round 22-24 repeat round 2 round 25 repeat round 9 40 double_crochet round 26-27 repeat round 2 start back round 28 repeat round 2 but do not join at the end of round round 29 turn single_crochet chain 2 in between 1st and 2nd double_crochet double_crochet in between next and all double_crochet adding 4 double_crochet in the round double_crochet in between last 2 double_crochet and in turning chain 44 double_crochet round 30-32 turn single_crochet chain 2 in between 1st and 2nd double_crochet double_crochet in between next and all double_crochet to end of round double_crochet in turning chain round 33 repeat round 29 48 double_crochet round 34-36 repeat round 30 round 37 repeat round 29 52 double_crochet round 38-40 repeat round 30 round 41 repeat round 29 56 double_crochet round 42-46 repeat round 30 round 47 turn single_crochet chain 2 in between 1st and 2nd double_crochet work double_crochet in between all double_crochet decreasing 4 stitches in round 52 double_crochet round 48-50 turn work one round even round 51 repeat round 47 48 double_crochet round 52-54 turn work one round even round 55 repeat round 47 44 double_crochet round 56-58 turn work one round even round 59 repeat round 47 40 double_crochet at the end of this round join in top chain of 1st stitch 2 start 2nd arm round 60 turn repeat round 2 you should have 39 double_crochet round 61-62 repeat round 60 round 63 turn work
